about.title: About Me
about.description:
ðŸ‘‹ Hello! I'm Wilson HernÃ¡ndez, a developer in training passionate about technology and innovation. I have solid knowledge in programming languages like C#, HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and TypeScript, plus experience developing applications with Node.js and modern frameworks like React, Angular, Vue.js, and Express.js. I handle relational databases like SQL Server, MySQL, and Oracle, as well as NoSQL databases like MongoDB, which allows me to design and build complete solutions from backend to frontend. I consider myself a curious, self-taught person focused on continuous improvement. My goal is to become a versatile programmer, capable of developing scalable projects with real impact.

I am characterized by being self-taught, disciplined, and passionate about reading. I constantly seek to learn new technologies and apply what I learn in real projects.

When I disconnect from the keyboard, I like to go for walks and enjoy the fresh air. I believe that walking not only clears the mind, but also stimulates creativity and improves mental health, something essential to stay inspired day by day.

items.title: Personal Blog

items.name: C#
items.description: Object-oriented programming language developed by Microsoft. Ideal for developing web applications, desktop software and robust APIs.

items.name: HTML5
items.description: Markup language for creating web page structure. HTML5 includes new semantic elements, APIs and better multimedia capabilities.

items.name: CSS3
items.description: Cascading Style Sheets for web page design and presentation. CSS3 includes animations, transitions and responsive design.

items.name: JavaScript
items.description: Programming language that adds interactivity and dynamism to web pages. Allows creating rich and interactive user experiences.

items.name: TypeScript
items.description: JavaScript superset that adds static typing. Improves productivity and reduces errors in large and complex applications.

items.name: Node.js
items.description: JavaScript runtime environment for server-side development. Enables creating scalable APIs, web servers and backend applications.

items.name: React
items.description: JavaScript library for building interactive user interfaces. Enables creating modern web applications with reusable components.

items.name: Express.js
items.description: Minimalist web framework for Node.js. Facilitates creating REST APIs and web servers quickly and efficiently.

items.name: Bootstrap
items.description: CSS framework that facilitates development of responsive and modern interfaces with pre-designed components and grid system.

items.name: Tailwind CSS
items.description: Utility-first CSS framework that enables creating custom designs quickly with predefined and highly customizable classes.

items.name: Sass
items.description: CSS preprocessor that adds features like variables, mixins and functions to write more efficient and maintainable CSS.

items.name: SQL Server
items.description: Microsoft's relational database management system. Powerful database engine for enterprise and web applications.

items.name: MySQL
items.description: World's most popular open source relational database. Ideal for web applications and high concurrency systems.

items.name: Oracle
items.description: Leading enterprise database management system in the market. Robust and scalable for business-critical applications.

items.name: MongoDB
items.description: Document-oriented NoSQL database. Flexible and scalable, perfect for modern applications with unstructured data.
